titles.title: A bill to provide for the extension of the enforcement instruction on supervision requirements for outpatient therapeutic services in critical access and small rural hospitals through 2015.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

calendar.text: Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Finance. Reported by Senator Hatch with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 114-109.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 188.

bill.summary: 7/30/2015--Reported to Senate amended. (Sec. 1) This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to continue to instruct Medicare contractors not to enforce requirements for direct physician supervision of outpatient therapeutic services in critical access and small rural hospitals through 2015.
